filter_valid_data

postprocessinglib.evaluation.metrics.filter_valid_data(df: DataFrame, station_num: int = 0, station: str = '', remove_neg: bool = False, remove_zero: bool = False, remove_NaN: bool = False, remove_inf: bool = False) → DataFrame

Removes the invalid values from a dataframe

Parameters:

  • df (pd.DataFrame) – the dataframe which you want to remove invalid values from

  • station_num (int) – the number referring to the station values we are trying to modify

  • True (remove_inf =) – indicates that the negative fields are the inavlid ones

  • True – indicate that the zero fields are the invalid ones

  • True – indicate that the empty fields are the invalid ones

  • True – indicate that the inf fields are the invalid ones

Returns:

the modified input dataframe

Return type:

pd.DataFrame
